errors.max: {{ label }} must be less or equal to {{ max }}

edit-basket.message: To complete your order, please fill the following form.
edit-basket.name: Your name
edit-basket.rationale-hint: Please give all the details that can help us handle your order quickly:
edit-basket.rationale-question1: for what purpose do you order these accessions?

edit-basket.confirm-accession-deletion: Do you really want to delete this accession from your order?

edit-basket.data-collection-link: Learn more about the handling of your data and your rights

edit-basket.gdpr-agreement-required: You must check this box in order to finalize your order

basket-confirmation.error: The confirmation of your order has failed.

confirmed.dispatched-message: It has been dispatched to the various persons in charge of the ordered accessions, who will contact you by email, using the address
